name: Whitevale Defender
description: Whitevale Defender is a 2D replayable tower defense. You'll be defending the castle of Whitevale over and over against hordes of war machines. Each play through you will be advancing your defensive and economic arsenal while also honing your tower placements until you can save Whitevale for good.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1.8 GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT/s 4xx or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 130 MB available space
